<title>Evil Men</title>
<description>Evil Men is a podcast hosted by three comedians - Chris Locke, James Hartnett, and Michael Balazo.  Each episode, they select a single evil man, bad person, or fictional character and discuss what made them so damn evil - all while joking their heads off.  You’ll hear some super interesting nuggets of information about dubious historical or cultural figures, provided by three guys who don’t actually know what the hell they’re talking about.</description>
<image>
<title>Evil Men</title>
<url>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/sites/45/2021/06/Evil-Men-logo-w-sonar-black-scaled.jpg</url>
<link>http://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/</link>
</image>

<title>E103: Robert Oppenheimer w/ Scott Rogowsky</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=389</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/robert-oppenheimer-w-scott-rogowsky</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 20 Jul 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/389/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/56160588/download.mp3" length="87046804" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Whoa! This week, Evil Men welcomes comedian, quiz show host and vintage clothing merchant Scott Rogowsky to the show to discuss "father of the atomic bomb," J. Robert Oppenheimer! Enjoy.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Whoa! This week, Evil Men welcomes comedian, quiz show host and vintage clothing merchant Scott Rogowsky to the show to discuss &#8220;father of the atomic bomb,&#8221; J. Robert Oppenheimer! Enjoy.</p>
<p>PLUS: Scott treats us to a Weird? Way Cool? Or&#8230; Whatever?</p>
<p>Be sure to follow Scott on <a href="https://twitter.com/ScottRogowsky">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/scottrogowsky/">Instagram</a>. And if you&#8217;re in LA and looking for some real cool threads, stop by his store <a href="https://quizdaddys.com/">Quiz Daddy&#8217;s</a>!</p>
<p>***<br />
EVIL MEN LIVE AT THE PARADISE THEATRE in Toronto is happening on August 24, 2023. This will be an unforgettable night of live podcast insanity featuring special guests, outrageous humour and fantastic memories. 15% discount for Patreon subscribers! <a href="https://www.eventbrite.com/e/evil-men-live-tickets-674793133427?aff=oddtdtcreator">CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS!!!</a></p>
<p>You can now watch <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt3VUKcGpRo">Chris Locke: Live at His Own Birthday</a> on YouTube! This show was recorded on March 7, 2023 before a sold out crowd at Comedy Bar in Toronto. Check it out! It&#8217;s very good!</p>
<p>***</p>

<title>E102: Jordan Peterson</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=388</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e102-jordan-peterson</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 13 Jul 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/388/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/56064843/download.mp3" length="90883703" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Listen up, buckos: this week we look at the incredible story of Jordan Peterson, one of Canada's most famous YouTubers and zoot suit owners. Enjoy.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Listen up, buckos: this week <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> is telling <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> the story of Jordan Peterson, one of Canada&#8217;s most famous YouTubers and zoot suit owners. Enjoy.</p>
<p>PLUS: James tells a harrowing story about being flirted with while trying to return a shirt.<br />
***</p>
<p>EVIL MEN LIVE AT THE PARADISE THEATRE in Toronto is happening on August 24, 2023. This will be an unforgettable night of live podcast insanity featuring special guests, outrageous humour and fantastic memories. PLUS, Patreon subscribers get 15% off tickets when using the exclusive promo code. <a href="https://www.eventbrite.com/e/evil-men-live-tickets-674793133427?aff=oddtdtcreator">CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS!!!</a></p>

***</p>

<item>
<title>E101: William Chaloner</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=387</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e101-william-chaloner</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:14:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/387/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/56015837/download.mp3" length="77340941" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week it's the sordid tale of William Challoner, the 17th century serial counterfeiter and conman who scammed his way through life until he was shot down in a blaze of glory by none other than England's Mr. Badass aka Sir Isaac Newton. Damn.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> the sordid tale of William Challoner, the 17th century serial counterfeit coiner and confidence trickster who scammed and schemed his way through life until he was shot down in a blaze of glory by none other than England&#8217;s Mr. Badass aka Sir Isaac Newton. Damn.</p>
<p>***<br />
EVIL MEN LIVE AT THE PARADISE THEATRE in Toronto is happening on August 24, 2023. This will be an unforgettable night of live podcast insanity featuring special guests, outrageous humour and fantastic memories. Mark your calendars. TICKETS ON SALE SOON&#8230;</p>
<p>You can now watch <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt3VUKcGpRo&#038;t=6s">Chris Locke: Live at His Own Birthday on YouTube</a>! This show was recorded on March 7, 2023 before a sold out crowd at Comedy Bar in Toronto. Check it out! It&#8217;s very good!<br />
***</p>

<item>
<title>E100: A 100th Episode BBQ Party!</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=386</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e100-a-100th-episode-bbq-party</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 29 Jun 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/386/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/55428907/download.mp3" length="103102248" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>It's the historic 100th episode of Evil Men, so Chris, James and Michael are celebrating with a BBQ party! Guests include comedians Tom Henry, Aaron Eves, Evany Rosen and Tim Gilbert, all of whom have brought a li'l something evil to discuss. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are celebrating the historic 100th episode of Evil Men! And they&#8217;re doing it the best way they know how&#8211;by throwing a small but powerful barbecue party. Barbecue guests include comedians <a href="https://www.instagram.com/tomdhenry/?hl=en">Tom Henry</a>, <a href="https://www.instagram.com/aaron_eves_/">Aaron Eves</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/evanyrosen">Evany Rosen</a> and <a href="https://timgilbert.bandcamp.com/">Tim Gilbert</a>, all of whom have brought a li&#8217;l something evil to discuss. So pour yourself a drink, munch a burger and enjoy! Thanks for listening!</p>
<p>***<br />
You can now watch <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt3VUKcGpRo&#038;t=6s">Chris Locke: Live at His Own Birthday on YouTube</a>! This show was recorded on March 7, 2023 before a sold out crowd at Comedy Bar in Toronto. Check it out! It&#8217;s very good!<br />
***</p>
<p>SPONSORS:</p>
<p>If you’re looking for an easier way to take supplements, increase your energy and live your best life, Athletic Greens is giving you a FREE 1-year supply of Vitamin D AND 5 free travel packs with your first purchase. Check it out.</p>

<title>E99: The Teacup Poisoner with Jackie Pirico</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=385</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e99-the-teacup-poisoner-with-jackie-pirico</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 22 Jun 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/385/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/54598892/download.mp3" length="88308399" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week comedian Jackie Pirico brings us the story of Graham Young aka The Teacup Poisoner. While most 60s teens were grooving to The Beatles, Graham was obsessed with Hitler and poisoning everyone all the time, constantly. Shagadellic? Not so. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are joined once more by hilarious comedian <a href="https://www.instagram.com/jackiepirico/?hl=en">Jackie Pirico</a>. And you&#8217;d best watch your drinks, because Jackie is eager to talk about Graham Young, an unusual British fellow also known as The Teacup Poisoner. While most 60s teens were grooving to The Beatles and Rolling Stones, Graham was obsessed with toxicology, Hitler and poisoning everyone all the time, as much as he could. And then some more! Shagadellic? Not so. Enjoy!</p>
<p>***<br />
You can now watch <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt3VUKcGpRo">Chris Locke: Live at His Own Birthday</a> on YouTube! This show was recorded on March 7, 2023 before a sold out crowd at Comedy Bar in Toronto. Check it out! It&#8217;s very good!</p>
<p>Also: Evil Men&#8217;s Michael Balazo is recording a live standup album at Toronto&#8217;s Comedy Bar on Thursday, June 22 @ 9:30PM and Friday, June 23 @ 7:00PM. The phenomenal Jackie Pirico is hosting, and there will be a handful of hilarious guests including Chris Locke, Amar Singh, Ben Stager and Sooz Kempner. It&#8217;d be great to see you there. <a href="https://comedybar.ca/shows/michael-balazo-album-recording?ev=2023-06-22T21%3A30%3A00">BUY TICKETS HERE</a>.</p>

<title>E98: Pat Robertson with Terrance Balazo</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=384</guid>

<description>This week we're joined by Toronto quizmaster and notable brother Terrance Balazo to discuss the life and times of bigoted Christian broadcaster and one-time Presidential candidate Pat Robertson, who recently passed away and died forever. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are joined by Toronto quizmaster and notable brother <a href="https://twitter.com/T_Balazo">Terrance Balazo</a>. After chatting about childhood memories and tummy trouble, the fellas settle down to discuss the life and times of bigoted Christian broadcaster and one-time Presidential candidate Pat Robertson, who recently passed away and died forever. Enjoy!</p>

To subscribe, head to <a href="https://www.privateinternetaccess.com/offer/recommended?coupon=2Y4M&#038;channel=Evil%20Men&#038;channel_platform=pc&#038;aff_id=18134&#038;source=Pod1">PIAVPN.com/EvilMen</a> and get an 82% discount! Seriously&#8230; 82%! That&#8217;s just $2.03 a month, and you also get 4 extra months completely for free!</p>

<title>E93: John Harvey Kellogg</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=377</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e93-john-harvey-kellogg</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 11 May 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/377/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/53811951/download.mp3" length="75939898" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Everyone loves Frosted Flakes, Rice Crispies and Froot Loops. But did you know that the man behind these famous meals was a religious fanatic who was obsessed with feces and the dominance of the white race? It's true. And his name was John Harvey Kellogg.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Everyone loves Frosted Flakes, Rice Crispies and Froot Loops. But did you know that the man behind these famous meals was a religious fanatic who was obsessed with feces and the dominance of the white race? This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> all about 19th century health freak/eugenics enthusiast John Harvey Kellogg. Enjoy!</p>

<title>E89: Jeff Gillooly with Aaron Read</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=373</guid>

<description>This week we're joined by comedian, musician and artist Aaron Read to gab about one of history's cruelest moustache owners: Jeff Gillooly aka Mr. Tonya Harding aka the guy who masterminded the infamous attack on Nancy Kerrigan. Enjoy?

Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are joined by comedian, musician and artist <a href="https://www.instagram.com/clear.dog.food/">Aaron Read </a>to gab about one of history&#8217;s cruelest moustache owners: Jeff Gillooly. During a stormy marriage to figure skater Tonya Harding, Mr. Gillooly masterminded the infamous/insane attack on Tonya&#8217;s rival Nancy Kerrigan. But, as you know, it didn&#8217;t go well. Enjoy?</p>

<title>E88: The Kraken</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=372</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e88-the-kraken</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 06 Apr 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/372/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/53457609/download.mp3" length="70336388" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we look at one of the most terrifying sea creatures in history: the kraken. It's as big as the Hollywood sign and can drag ships and sailors to the bottom of the ocean with its huge tentacles and powerful suckers. It probably stinks, too. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> about one of the most terrifying sea creatures of all: the kraken. It&#8217;s as big as the Hollywood sign and can drag ships and sailors to the bottom of the ocean with its huge gooey tentacles and powerful suckers. In other words? The kraken is the exact opposite of Sebastian from the Littler Mermaid. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: Jerry Seinfeld and his teen girlfriend, Gremlins, and James accuses Michael of being obsessed with Eataly.</p>
<p>*** WARNING: If you&#8217;re in Toronto on April 12, come out to Precious Moments comedy, the unbelievable new show hosted by Michael Balazo and Jackie Pirico. The lineup features comedians Adam Christie, Jordan Foisy, Amar Singh and Rebecca Payne. The show is at Reposado (136 Ossington Ave.) at 8pm and it&#8217;s pay what you can. ***</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon </a>for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats. Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/evilmenpod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener Christian Miles.</p>

<title>E87: O.J. Simpson w/ Blocked Party</title>

<description>This week we welcome Stefan Heck and John Cullen from the fantastic Blocked Party podcast. They were eager to talk about NFL legend and movie star O.J. Simpson, and we were in no position to turn them down. Enjoy?
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week we welcome <a href="https://twitter.com/boring_as_heck">Stefan Heck</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/cullenthecomic">John Cullen</a> from the fantastic <a href="https://blockedparty.com/">Blocked Party</a> podcast. They were eager to talk about NFL legend and movie star O.J. Simpson, and we were in no position to turn them down. Enjoy?</p>
<p>PLUS: a slightly raunchy intro featuring Venus for Men, revolving restaurants and flag history.</p>

<title>E85: Erik the Red</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=365</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e85-erik-the-red</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 16 Mar 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/365/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/53215972/download.mp3" length="70631531" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we take a trip back to the 10th century with notorious Norse viking Erik the Red. A fierce fellow who did his talking with his sword, Erik also loved to explore. In fact, he founded the first European settlement in Greenland. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week we take a trip back to the 10th century as <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> about notorious Norse viking Erik the Red. Erik was a fierce fellow who did his talking with his sword. But he also loved to explore the north Atlantic ocean. In fact, he founded the first European settlement in Greenland. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: our crudest intro ever. Oops.</p>

<title>E83: Scott Adams</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=363</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e83-scott-adams</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 02 Mar 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/363/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/53066267/download.mp3" length="75751889" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we tackle visual artist Scott Adams, who has brought joy to millions with his hilarious comic strip Dilbert. Sadly, Mr. Adams has also found himself in hot water over the years for his odd views on women, Donald Trump and race relations. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> about visual artist Scott Adams, who has brought joy to millions of people with his hilarious comic strip Dilbert. Sadly, Mr. Adams has also found himself in hot water over the years for his odd views on women, Donald Trump and race relations. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: Radiohead, Liver King and Goof Troop!</p>

<title>E82: Boris Johnson with Sooz Kempner</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=362</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e82-boris-johnson-with-sooz-kempner</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 23 Feb 2023 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/362/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/52817323/download.mp3" length="70717474" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Hey everyone! This week we're joined by returning guest Sooz Kempner, who traveled all the way from Britain to talk privately with Chris, Michael and James about Boris Johnson, the politician with funny hair and unlimited children. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hey everyone! This week we&#8217;re joined by returning guest <a href="https://twitter.com/SoozUK">Sooz Kempner</a>, who traveled all the way from Britain to talk privately with <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> about Boris Johnson, the politician with funny hair and unlimited children.</p>
<p>PLUS: Princess Diana, 9/11, horses and MORE!</p>
<p>*** ATTENTION: UK listeners. Sooz is going on tour across England and Scotland with her specatular show PlayStation in April. <a href="https://www.soozkempner.co.uk/copy-of-playstation-2022">CLICK HERE</a> for dates and tickets. Don&#8217;t miss it!</p>

<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener Christian Miles.</p>

<title>E81: Set, the Egyptian God of War, Chaos and Storms</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=361</guid>

<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/361/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/52746221/download.mp3" length="70342943" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we look at Set, the Egyptian god of war, chaos and storms. Set began life as a nice man before becoming a ruthless, power hungry god who sowed chaos, murdered and mutilated his own brother Osiris, and assaulted his nephew Horus at a sleepover.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hey everyone! This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> tells <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> all about Set, the Egyptian god of war, chaos and storms. Set began life as a cool, nice man before becoming a ruthless, power hungry god who sowed chaos across the land, murdered and mutilated his own brother Osiris, and assaulted his nephew Horus during a sleepover. How rude can you get? </p>
<p>PLUS: UFOs, balloons and James tries to hypnotize himself into having a healthy tummy.</p>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hey everyone! Sure, he&#8217;s in the news for lying about his religion, ethnicity, work history and how his mom died from 9/11, but he also ran a fake charity for vulnerable animals. He&#8217;s the ultimate politician!</p>

<item>
<title>Unlocked! The Evil Test 3 with Aaron Read!</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=355</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/unlocked-the-evil-test-3-with-aaron-read</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 05 Jan 2023 09:51:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/355/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/52361298/download.mp3" length="40453563" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Happy New Year to all! This week, the Evil Men men are taking a tiny break and gathering strength for 2023. In the meantime, we've unlocked a classic Patreon bonus episode, featuring west coast comedian Aaron Read. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Happy New Year to all!</p>
<p>This week, the cast of Evil Men is taking a tiny break and gathering the strength we&#8217;ll need to podcast at a high level in 2023. In the meantime, we&#8217;ve unlocked a classic Patreon bonus episode, featuring west coast comedian Aaron Read. </p>
<p>In this episode, we welcome Aaron back after his appearance as Freddy Krueger on Evil Men episode 17. Here, he joins Chris, James and Michael to answer some tough moral questions and gossip about several topics. Enjoy!</p>
<p>Check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> fantastic new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.crave.ca/en/tv-shows/chris-locke-captain-bones">now on Crave.</a></p>

<title>E72: Victor Lustig</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e72-victor-lustig/</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e72-victor-lustig</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 01 Dec 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/344/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/52058267/download.mp3" length="64455349" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week, it's the totally outrageous story of legendary conman Victor Lustig. During the early 20th century, Victor scammed and schemed his way across Europe and North America, ripping off gamblers and bejewelled women. 
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hey everyone. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> dazzles <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> with the totally outrageous story of conman Victor Lustig. During the early 20th century, Victor scammed and schemed his way across Europe and North America, ripping off gamblers and bejewelled women. He even managed to &#8220;sell&#8221; the Eiffel Tower to one very unlucky mark. And he did it all dressed in elegant suits and wearing a waxed moustache. Enjoy!</p>
<p>This episode is brought to you by BetterHelp. <content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hey everyone. You might <em>think</em> he fiddled while Rome burned, but in reality he was much more into singing, dancing and acting. Enjoy!</p>

<title>E70: Bill Maher with Tom Henry</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=337</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e70-bill-maher-with-tom-henry</link>

<title>E69: Leopold and Loeb with David Dineen-Porter</title>

<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e69-leopold-and-loeb-with-david-dineen-porter</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 10 Nov 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/336/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51837255/download.mp3" length="32125518" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we're releasing a Patreon bonus episode to the general public. Comedian, writer and musician David Dineen-Porter visits Chris, James and Michael to talk about Chicago's infamous/fancy murder duo Leopold and Loeb. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">This week we&#8217;re releasing a Patreon bonus episode to the general public. Comedian, writer and musician <a href="https://twitter.com/dineenporter">David Dineen-Porter</a> visits </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> to talk about Chicago&#8217;s infamous murder duo Leopold and Loeb. How could such nice, fancy boys commit a crime so demented and heinous? Listen to find out!</p>

<description>It's Michael Jackson week on Evil Men! And to celebrate the occasion, Chris, James and Michael welcome special British guest Sooz Kempner to talk and gossip all about the King of Pop and his unusual antics. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>It&#8217;s Michael Jackson week on Evil Men! And to celebrate the occasion, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> welcome special British guest <a href="https://twitter.com/SoozUK">Sooz Kempner</a> to talk and gossip all about the King of Pop and his unusual antics. Enjoy!</p>

<title>E67: Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare!</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=332</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e67-evil-men-live-a-halloween-frightmare</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Fri, 28 Oct 2022 05:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/332/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51726768/download.mp3" length="84594941" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week we give you Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare!, recorded on Oct. 28, 2022 at Comedy Bar in Toronto.

Ft. Brandon Ash-Mohammed as Idi Amin, Sooz Kempner as Meghan McCain, Tim Gilbert as Minion and Isaac Winter as the Evilometer.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Happy Halloween! This week,  <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> would like to treat you to Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare!, recorded on October 28, 2022 in front of a sold out crowd at Comedy Bar in Toronto.</p>
<p>Featuring special guests:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.instagram.com/brandonamcomedy">Brandon Ash-Mohammed</a> as Idi Amin</li>
<li><a href="https://twitter.com/SoozUK">Sooz Kempner</a> as Meghan McCain</li>
<li><a href="https://www.instagram.com/gilberttim">Tim Gilbert</a> as Minion</li>
<li>Isaac Winter as the Evilometer</li>
</ul>
<p>NOTE: There is a bit of a microphone buzzing noise for the first 15 minutes or so of the episode. We tried to minimize it as much as possible, and it goes away eventually. Apologies!</p>
<p>Enjoy!</p>
<p>ALSO: Check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> fantastic new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.crave.ca/en/tv-shows/chris-locke-captain-bones">now on Crave.</a></p>

<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>

<item>
<title>E66: Betty Broderick w/ Jackie Pirico</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=329</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e66-betty-broderick-w-jackie-pirico</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 20 Oct 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/329/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51626062/download.mp3" length="79934294" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Comedian Jackie Pirico returns to the Evil Men studio to examine the life of convicted murderer/annoyed wife Betty Broderick. She gained notoriety for killing her ex-husband and his new wife in 1989, but was what she did pure homicide... or self-defense?
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, funny comedian Jackie Pirico returns to the Evil Men studio to examine the life of convicted murderer/annoyed wife Betty Broderick. She gained notoriety for killing her ex-husband and his new wife in 1989, but was what she did pure homicide&#8230; or self-defense? Sit back and listen as Jackie, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James,</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> learn about a very unhealthy marriage. Enjoy!</p>
<p>Be sure to <a href="https://twitter.com/jackiepirico">follow Jackie on Twitter.</a> And pick up her fantastic <a href="https://jackiepirico.bandcamp.com/releases">new standup album SPLASHPAD</a>.</p>
<p>ALSO: Check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> fantastic new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.crave.ca/en/tv-shows/chris-locke-captain-bones">now on Crave.</a></p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>

<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>E65: Morrissey</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=327</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e65-morrissey</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 13 Oct 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/327/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51558594/download.mp3" length="72326236" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Moz. The Pope of Mope. Vegetable Steven. Since rising to fame in the early 80s as the frontman of The Smiths, Morrissey has given the world some of the greatest music and some of the worst opinions of all time. Enjoy?
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Moz. The Pope of Mope. Vegetable Steven. He has many names, but most people know him simply as Morrissey. And since rising to fame in the early 80s as the frontman of The Smiths, Morrissey has given the world some of the greatest music&#8211;and some of the worst opinions&#8211;of all time. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James,</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> explore the life of this talented but extremely annoying man. Enjoy!</p>
<p>ALSO: Check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> fantastic new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.bellmedia.ca/the-lede/press/crave-delivers-homegrown-canadian-comedy-with-seven-new-crave-original-stand-up-specials/">now on Crave.</a></p>
<p>***</p>
<p>IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: on October 28, 2022, Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare is happening at 9pm at Comedy Bar in Toronto. This will be an unforgettable/terrifying night of humour, fear, special guests, surprises and goo. <a href="https://comedybar.ca/shows/evil-men-live?ev=2022-10-28T21%3A00%3A00">CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS.</a></p>

<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>E64: Hulk Hogan</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=326</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e64-hulk-hogan</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 06 Oct 2022 00:07:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/326/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51482144/download.mp3" length="69511007" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Hulk Hogan is possibly the most famous wrestler who has ever walked the face of the earth. And this week, James, Michael and Chris explore the Hulkster's life in and out of the ring. Not great! Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Hulk Hogan is possibly the most famous wrestler who has ever walked the face of the earth. He was pro wrestling&#8217;s first mega superstar, worshipped by millions of children. But he was also a union buster, sex video actor and sayer of racial slurs. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James,</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> explore the Hulkster&#8217;s life in and out of the ring. Enjoy!</p>
<p>ALSO: Check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> fantastic new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.bellmedia.ca/the-lede/press/crave-delivers-homegrown-canadian-comedy-with-seven-new-crave-original-stand-up-specials/">now on Crave.</a></p>
<p>***</p>
<p>IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: on October 28, 2022, Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare is happening at 9pm at Comedy Bar in Toronto. This will be an unforgettable/terrifying night of humour, fear, special guests, surprises and goo. <a href="https://comedybar.ca/shows/evil-men-live?ev=2022-10-28T21%3A00%3A00">CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS.</a></p>

<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<title>E63: Henry VIII with Evany Rosen</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=325</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e63-henry-viii-with-evany-rosen</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 29 Sep 2022 16:42:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/325/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51421075/download.mp3" length="71903578" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Comedian and writer Evany Rosen joins us to talk about one of England's horniest and rudest kings: Henry VIII. From his early days as a sexy hunk to his later struggles with gout, festering leg wounds and six doomed marriages, we cover it all. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, comedian and writer Evany Rosen joins <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> to talk about one of England&#8217;s horniest and rudest kings: Henry VIII. From his early days as a sexy young hunk to his later struggles with gout, festering leg wounds and six doomed marriages, Evany talks us through it all! The guy was NOT a great hubby! Enjoy!</p>
<p>Be sure to <a href="https://twitter.com/evanyrosen">follow Evany on Twitter</a> and pick up her fantastic book <a href="https://arsenalpulp.com/Books/W/What-I-Think-Happened">What I Think Happened.</a></p>
<p>And check out <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke&#8217;s</a> new standup special Captain Bones, out <a href="https://www.bellmedia.ca/the-lede/press/crave-delivers-homegrown-canadian-comedy-with-seven-new-crave-original-stand-up-specials/">September 30, 2022 on Crave.</a></p>
<p>***</p>
<p>IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: on October 28, 2022, Evil Men Live: A Halloween Frightmare is happening at 9pm at Comedy Bar in Toronto. (NOTE: The test itself starts around the 15:00 mark, after some truly excellent beatboxing.)</p>
<p>Ennis recently joined us on episode 60 to talk about baseball/syringe legend Jose Canseco. But this week? We&#8217;re interrogating HIM. Enjoy!</p>

<item>
<title>E61: Edward Bernays</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=320</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e61-edward-bernays</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 15 Sep 2022 11:18:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/320/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51270520/download.mp3" length="69502611" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Edward Bernays is recognized as the godfather of modern public relations. Using his uncle Sigmund Freud's theories, he injected psychology into advertising to convince Americans to eat bacon and buy bananas. He also got women to start smoking. Nice!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Edward Bernays is widely considered to be the godfather of modern public relations. Using his uncle Sigmund Freud&#8217;s theories, he injected psychology into advertising to convince Americans to fight in WWI, eat bacon and buy bananas. He also got women to start smoking. Great stuff! This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> look at the life of Edward Bernays. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<itunes:episodeType>episode</itunes:episodeType>
<itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit>
<itunes:duration>4964</itunes:duration>
<itunes:summary>Edward Bernays is recognized as the godfather of modern public relations. Using his uncle Sigmund Freud's theories, he injected psychology into advertising to convince Americans to eat bacon and buy bananas. He also got women to start smoking. Nice!

<item>
<title>E59: Phil Spector</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=315</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e59-phil-spector</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 01 Sep 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/315/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51094776/download.mp3" length="73297621" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>In the early 1960s, Phil Spector revolutionized pop music with his Wall of Sound productions. But as the years passed, Phil's behaviour became increasingly violent, obsessive and threatening, culminating in the 2003 death of actress Lana Clarkson. 
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>In the early 1960s, Phil Spector revolutionized pop music with his Wall of Sound productions and girl group masterpieces. But as the years passed, Phil&#8217;s behaviour became increasingly violent, obsessive and threatening, culminating in the 2003 death of actress Lana Clarkson. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> look at the unruly and tragic life of Phil Spector.</p>
<p>PLUS: the intro features Elvis, Roy Orbison AND a mother story!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>UNLOCKED! EVIL ZEN 20 &#8211; Live from a Cottage Pt. 2</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=313</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/unlocked-evil-zen-20-live-from-a-cottage-pt-2</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 25 Aug 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/313/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/51022596/download.mp3" length="53324878" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week, Evil Men is doing something a little different and UNLOCKING a Patreon bonus episode recorded at a cottage.

This time, the men wonder if there's a killer hiding in the basement, review some DVDs and discuss Canadian reggae star Snow. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are doing something a little different/dangerous and UNLOCKING a Patreon bonus episode for your enjoyment.</p>
<p>In July, we went to a cottage to take the country air and record some classics. This is the second of four bonus episodes we recorded there. In this episode, we wonder if there&#8217;s a murderer hiding out in the basement, review the DVDs on offer and talk about Canadian reggae superstar Snow. PLUS: James remembers Star Trek: The Next Generation. Please enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats like this.</p>

<item>
<title>E58: Caravaggio</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=312</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e58-caravaggio</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 18 Aug 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/312/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/50935660/download.mp3" length="74025718" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio revolutionized painting with his dramatic use of light and shade, and by bringing the grit and grime of 16th century Rome to the canvas. Oh, and he also liked to brawl, write rude poems and he killed some guys. Enjoy! 
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio was the original artistic bad boy. He punched cops, threw rocks at landlords and loved a good street brawl. He also revolutionized painting with his dramatic use of light and shade, and by bringing the grit and grime of 16th century Rome to the canvas. Oh, he also killed some guys and spent the last years of his life on the run. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> meet the notorious Caravaggio. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: the intro features Blues Brothers gossip, a review of Jason Statham&#8217;s fantastic film Crank, and the fellas reveal the names of their upcoming Netflix comedy specials!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>

<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> listen to the facts and judge Mr. Bout once and for all, like three cool Canadian Gods. Enjoy!</p>

<description>William Hitler was Adolf’s ambitious but frustrated half-nephew. Sadly, William and his famous uncle had a frosty, dysfunctional relationship. This week, Evil Men takes a look at what happens when uncles and nephews don't love each other. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>William Hitler was Adolf’s ambitious but frustrated half-nephew. Born in Liverpool in 1911, William and his famous uncle had a frosty relationship, which is very sad. In fact, William was so upset that his uncle wouldn’t give him a cushy job in Nazi Germany that he turned to blackmail and humiliating the Führer in the press. This week <a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael </a>take a look at one of the most fraught uncle-nephew relationships in history. Enjoy!</p>

<title>E53: Francisco Nguema w/ Brandon Ash-Mohammed</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=294</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e53-francisco-nguema-w-brandon-ash-mohammed</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 14 Jul 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/294/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/50559965/download.mp3" length="59066990" type="audio/mpeg" />

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week comedian Brandon Ash-Mohammed stops by to talk about Francisco Macías Nguema, the brutal dictator who nearly destroyed Equatorial Guinea between 1968 and 1979. <a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael </a>don&#8217;t think much of the guy.</p>

<p>And keep track of past Evilometer scores at <a href="https://evilpedia.online/">Evilpedia</a>, created by listener <a href="https://twitter.com/cjlmiles">Christian Miles</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>

<title>E49: L. Ron Hubbard Pt.2</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=279</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e49-l-ron-hubbard-pt-2</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 16 Jun 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/279/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/50213772/download.mp3" length="67824369" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>L. Ron Hubbard aka Hubby transformed himself from a moderately successful sci-fi writer into the leader of his very own, very notorious religion. This week, Chris, James and Michael wrap up their look at the improbable life and times of Hubbus. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Uh oh: it&#8217;s part two of Evil Men&#8217;s look at the life of L. Ron Hubbard!</p>
<p>To some he was known as Hubby. To others, Hubbus. But whatever they called him, L. Ron Hubbard made history by transforming himself from a moderately successful sci-fi writer into the leader of his very own, very notorious religion. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> finish their look at the improbable life and times of the man they called Hubin. Enjoy!</span></p>
<p>PLUS: James doesn&#8217;t believe in democracy! Politics! And baseball!</p>
<p>Thank you to <a href="https://www.presentdaygifts.ca/">Present Day Gifts</a> for their assistance. If you&#8217;re looking for a magnificent gift basket for any occasion, look no further than Present Day Gifts.</p>

<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=277</guid>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>To some he was known as Hubby. To others, Hubbus. But whatever they called him, L. Ron Hubbard made history by transforming himself from a moderately successful sci-fi writer into the leader of his very own, very notorious religion. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> begin a two-part look at the improbable life and times of the man they called Hubin. <p>PLUS: Chris and James likes Rush. But Michael? Let&#8217;s just say&#8230; he doesn&#8217;t!</p>

<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>

<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/273/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/50027347/download.mp3" length="69447027" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Well all know Cobra Commander is the leader of a terrorist organization hellbent on destroying the G.I. Joe Team. But did you know that he started off as a bereaved used car salesman and fathers’ rights activist based on William F. Buckley Jr.? Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Unless you’ve been living under a rock, you know that Cobra Commander is the leader of Cobra, the evil terrorist organization that&#8217;s hellbent on destroying the G.I. Joe Team. But did you know that Cobra Commander started off as a used car salesman? That he was traumatized by the loss of his Vietnam vet brother? Or that he&#8217;s something of a fathers’ rights activist? <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> examine Cobra Commander&#8217;s life, evil plots and resemblance to William F. Buckley Jr. Enjoy!</span></p>
<p>PLUS: James swallows a furball! Chris has a family! And Michael listens to a podcast to drown out his late night thoughts!</p>

Soon after, he came to a violent, fiery end in a cabin northeast of Los Angeles. So, what drove this once friendly and upstanding guy to become a killer? This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> look at the life of Christopher Dorner and find out what happens when you blast a hole through the blue wall of silence.</span></p>

<title>E45: Saparmurat Niyazov, Great Leader of all Turkmen</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=270</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e45-saparmurat-niyazov-great-leader-of-all-turkmen</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Fri, 20 May 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/270/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49865266/download.mp3" length="68094993" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>The sun is shining, the weather is nice and EVERYBODY is talking about Saparmurat Niyazov, the Soviet-style dictator who ruled Turkmenistan from 1985 until his death in 2006. Sit back, relax and learn about the self-proclaimed Great Leader of all Turkmen!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">The sun is shining, the weather is nice and EVERYBODY is talking about Saparmurat Niyazov, the Soviet-style dictator who ruled Turkmenistan from 1985 until his death in 2006.</span></p>
<p>During <span style="font-size: 16px">Niyazov&#8217;s </span>reign, he ruined the economy, renamed the days of the week after his family members, banned dogs and cigarettes, and generally made life miserable for his subjects. He also tried to build an ice palace in the sweltering desert. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> take a walk through the streets of old Ashgabat to learn about the self-proclaimed Great Leader of all Turkmen.</span></p>
<p>PLUS: during the intro, we take an unforgettable trip to The James Zone.</p>
<p>Thank you to <a href="https://www.presentdaygifts.ca/">Present Day Gifts</a> for their assistance. If you&#8217;re looking for a magnificent gift basket for any occasion, look no further than Present Day Gifts.</p>

<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">Here it is: our first ever live episode! <title>E42: Piers Morgan with Graham Clark</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=258</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e42-piers-morgan-with-graham-clark</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 28 Apr 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/258/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49574648/download.mp3" length="66971495" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Piers Morgan might look perfect, but he's actually a little bit crappy. This week, Graham Clark from Stop Podcasting Yourself joins Evil Men to talk about Piers, his history of being a smarmy dick, and his friendship with Donald Trump. Enjoy?
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Piers Morgan has it all: a beautiful mind, a glistening soul and the body of a sexy hunk. But he&#8217;s also a little bit crappy. In fact, Piers rose to fame by harassing celebrities, writing racist headlines and attacking Meghan Markle 24/7. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, Graham Clark from <a href="https://maximumfun.org/podcasts/stop-podcasting-yourself/">Stop Podcasting Yourself</a> joins </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> to talk about Britain&#8217;s loveliest guy.</span></p>
<p>Be sure to <a href="https://twitter.com/grahamclark">follow Graham on Twitter.</a></p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<title>E41: J. Edgar Hoover</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=256</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e41-j-edgar-hoover</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 21 Apr 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/256/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49494517/download.mp3" length="69425794" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>As director of the FBI for nearly 50 years, J. Edgar Hoover shaped the institution into his own private intelligence army and used it to attack communism, the civil rights movement and maybe a president or two. Cool dude who was also very chill!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>As director of the FBI for nearly 50 years, J. Edgar Hoover shaped the institution into his own private intelligence army and used it to attack communism, the civil rights movement and maybe a president or two. But was he really just running from his own personal demons? The guy needed to relax, hey? <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> turn the tables on Hoover, and arrest <em>him </em>for once.</span></p>
<p>Plus, the intro features exciting COVID news, a visit to Coachella, and a complete review of James&#8217; latest vacation!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>

<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>E40: Hugh Hefner</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=253</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e40-hugh-hefner</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Fri, 08 Apr 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/253/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49358900/download.mp3" length="70882089" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>When Hugh Hefner launched Playboy in 1953, he took "dirty magazines" into the mainstream and changed American culture forever. But beneath Hef's monogrammed smoking jacket and knowing grin there lurked a monster...
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">When Hugh Hefner launched Playboy in 1953, he changed American culture forever. By combining pictures of naked women with serious, hip writing, Playboy challenged America&#8217;s repressed sexual values and took &#8220;dirty magazines&#8221; into the mainstream. But beneath Hef&#8217;s monogrammed smoking jacket and knowing grin there lurked a monster. This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> throw Hugh Hefner into the grotto.</span></p>
<p>Plus, the intro features the surprising origins of the tango, Rolling Stones news and the brutal destruction of a piñata. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>E39: Sidney Gottlieb</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=251</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e39-sidney-gottlieb</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/251/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49259712/download.mp3" length="73566082" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Sidney Gottlieb was considered by many to be the most prolific torturer of his generation. As head of the CIA's assassination and mind control program in the 1950s and 60s, Gottlieb's experiments with LSD ruined many lives and achieved nothing. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">Sidney Gottlieb was considered by many to be the most prolific torturer of his generation. A chemist who headed the CIA&#8217;s assassination and mind control program in the 1950s and 60s, Gottlieb was ruthless in his quest to weaponize the human mind during the Cold War. His experiments with LSD ruined countless lives and achieved little of value. This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> look at Sidney Gottlieb&#8217;s life and decide if he was a Groovy Gus&#8230; or a Nasty Norman.</span></p>
<p>Plus, the intro features: Spuds MacKenzie, the Red Hot Chili Peppers, the dark side of eating on the subway and lots of nonnas. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-size: 16px">It&#8217;s our GROSSEST and most REVOLTING episode ever! You might want to wear earplugs and nose plugs for this one. Ewwwwww.</span></p>
<p>Plus: in the intro, James prepares to go on a magnificent trip, and we reappraise Appetite for Destruction. Enjoy!</p>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>For a time, Mel Gibson was the world&#8217;s most beloved semi-Australian actor. Then he threw it all away by being too Catholic, too drunk and too abusive. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> look at Mel&#8217;s life and ask the question: will Australia ever be the same?</span></p>
<p>Plus: sound effects, a discussion about Super Freak, a fable and MORE! Enjoy!</p>

<item>
<title>E36: Grigori Rasputin</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=246</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e36-grigori-rasputin</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 10 Mar 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/246/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/49009566/download.mp3" length="76418260" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Grigori Rasputin was an unwashed, illiterate, self-styled mystic whose charisma and "healing powers" propelled him from Siberian obscurity to the centre of Tsar Nicholas II's court. This week, Chris, James and Michael find out if Rasputin was Russia's greatest love machine... or just a weird stinky guy.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Grigori Rasputin was an unwashed, illiterate, self-styled mystic whose charisma and &#8220;healing powers&#8221; propelled him from Siberian obscurity to the centre of Tsar Nicholas II&#8217;s court. <span style="font-size: 16px">This week, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a><span style="font-size: 16px">, </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> and </span><a style="font-size: 16px" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a><span style="font-size: 16px"> find out if Rasputin was Russia&#8217;s greatest love machine&#8230; or just a weird stinky guy.</span></p>
<p>Plus: Good Vibrations, Justin Trudeau&#8217;s real dad, Meat Loaf&#8217;s line in the sand and MORE. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes and special treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e33-qin-shi-huang-chinas-first-emperor</link>

<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/239/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/48757708/download.mp3" length="73984085" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Qin Shi Huang was China’s first emperor. He unified ancient China, built the Great Wall and commissioned the Terracotta Army. But he was also a brutal tyrant who burned books, enslaved his enemies and castrated anyone who made him angry. Ouch!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> pay a visit to Qin Shi Huang, China’s very first emperor. He unified ancient China, oversaw the construction of the Great Wall and commissioned the Terracotta Army, hoping it would protect him in the afterlife. But he was also a brutal tyrant who burned books, enslaved his enemies and castrated anyone who made him angry. The guy LOVED castration!</p>
<p>Plus, in the intro: James makes a bid for a Guinness World Record, we discuss Shaq’s stressful career as a commercial actor, and commence the official First Annual Evil Men Sexiest Voice Competition. Enjoy!</p>

<item>
<title>E29: William Colepaugh: America’s Dumbest Spy</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=232</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e29-william-colepaugh-americas-dumbest-spy</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 20 Jan 2022 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/232/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/48362497/download.mp3" length="64434570" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>William Colepaugh was a lonely Connecticut kid who grew up idolizing all things German. When America entered WWII, he did the unthinkable and defected to Germany to spy for the Nazis. Luckily, he was a bumbling, drunken fool and accomplished nothing.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>William Colepaugh was a lonely Connecticut kid who grew up idolizing all things German. He even had a framed picture of Hitler in his bedroom, which didn’t exactly solve his social problems. When America entered WWII, Colepaugh did the unthinkable: he defected to Germany and volunteered to spy for the Nazis. Luckily, he was a bumbling fool who spent more time drinking in Manhattan nightclubs than undermining the Manhattan Project. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> make fun of the Nazis and totally disrespect the Third Reich.</p>
<p>Plus: the intro revisits the Milli Vanilli controversy, sheds light on Nancy and Ronald Reagan’s special talents AND bigs up Ricky Gervais’ hit sitcom “Afterlife.” Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes, including SPECIAL EXCLUSIVE MATERIAL.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
