<title>E26: John du Pont with Jackie Pirico</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=212</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e26-john-du-pont-with-jackie-pirico</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 16 Dec 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/212/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/47940434/download.mp3" length="73628973" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Born into one of America’s most prestigious families, John du Pont could have done anything. But a lonely childhood, a balls tragedy(?) and his failure to achieve athletic greatness chipped away at his sanity, culminating in cold-blooded murder. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> welcome comedian <a href="https://twitter.com/JackiePirico">Jackie Pirico</a> to the pod. We kick things off by talking about: mad cow disease, frozen cigarettes, jail guys and the allure of dirtballs.</p>
<p>Our subject this week is American philanthropist, bird-lover, wrestling enthusiast and convicted murderer John du Pont. Born into one of America’s wealthiest and most prestigious families, John could have done anything. But a lonely childhood, a balls tragedy(?) and his failure to achieve athletic greatness chipped away at his sanity. Eventually, an unhinged John murdered Dave Schultz, a world champion wrestler who worked for him. Why? It’s unclear. Enjoy!</p>
<p>Be sure to download <a href="https://music.apple.com/ca/album/dream-phone/1475943551">Jackie&#8217;s hilarious album Dream Phone.</a></p>
<p>Be sure to watch Chris&#8217; crazy funny series <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ENvFQheXBO4&amp;list=PLtS85U0ACJHJLqTi0uo-5QFGjpyhZE55v">Learning Nature with Chris Locke!</a></p>

<item>
<title>E24: William Stoughton</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=202</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e24-william-stoughton</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Wed, 01 Dec 2021 23:36:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/202/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/47748511/download.mp3" length="68178387" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>William Stoughton served as Chief Justice during the Salem Witch Trials. A stern and extremely pious man, Stoughton's war on witchcraft fanned the flames of religious hysteria and resulted in the executions of twenty innocent people. What a nerd! Enjoy.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>In a lot of ways, Willam Stoughton was the original Judge Judy. Serving as Chief Justice during the Salem Witch Trials (1692-1693), Stoughton was a stern and extremely pious man who truly believed he was sent by God to chase the Devil out of Massachusetts Bay. Unfortunately, his righteous war on witchcraft involved arresting four-year-olds, terrorizing elderly, deaf women, and sentencing twenty innocent people to death based on &#8220;spectral evidence.&#8221; Enjoy!</p>
<p>ALSO: during the intro, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> talk about haunted homes, delicious late night meals and time travel.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive bonus episodes and dazzling treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>
<itunes:title>E24: William Stoughton</itunes:title>
<itunes:author>info@thesonarnetwork.com</itunes:author>
<itunes:episodeType>episode</itunes:episodeType>
<itunes:explicit>yes</itunes:explicit>
<itunes:duration>4869</itunes:duration>
<itunes:summary>William Stoughton served as Chief Justice during the Salem Witch Trials. A stern and extremely pious man, Stoughton's war on witchcraft fanned the flames of religious hysteria and resulted in the executions of twenty innocent people. What a nerd! Enjoy.

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Here’s a clip from our latest Patreon Bonus episode, where we create fantastic and legitimately funny Christmas song spoofs on the spot. For access to this and other premium episodes, subscribe at <a href="http://www.patreon.com/evilmen">www.patreon.com/evilmen</a></p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>

<item>
<title>E23: Lou Pearlman</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=193</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e23-lou-pearlman</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Wed, 24 Nov 2021 22:07:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/193/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/47646529/download.mp3" length="68765338" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>As the mastermind behind the Backstreet Boys and NSYNC, Lou Pearlman was one of the most powerful people in the music industry. But then he ruined it all by perpetrating the biggest Ponzi scheme in American history. Plus he was a bit of a creep. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>For a brief time in the late 1990s, Lou Pearlman was one of the most powerful people in the music industry. As the impresario behind the Backstreet Boys, NSYNC and the inimitable O-Town, he lived a gilded, glamorous life that was a world away from his modest upbringing in Queens. Unfortunately, he was also a conman who perpetrated the biggest Ponzi scheme in American history. And his behavior around fame-hungry teenage boys was… questionable. Lou Pearlman was a complicated man. But most of all, he was Art Garfunkel’s cousin. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: during the intro, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> discuss old rock star feuds, skin problems and obscene acts on public transportation.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive bonus episodes and dazzling treats.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p>***</p>
<p><strong>Evil Men fans: </strong></p>
<p>The holidays are almost here and our friend Adrian Guinn and his mom could use some help with a stressful situation. To find out more and help with a donation, <a href="https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-my-mom-with-costs-of-eviction?utm_campaign=p_lico+share-sheet&amp;utm_medium=copy_link&amp;utm_source=customer">please click HERE. </a>It would be much appreciated!</p>

<title>E21: Bill O’Reilly</title>

<description>For decades, Bill O'Reilly was one of television’s most popular and powerful conservative opinion makers. Then it all blew up in his face, he lost his TV show for being a creep, and he was forced to become friends with Dennis Miller. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Bill O’Reilly began life as an Irish Catholic New Yorker who lived in fear of Billy Joel. Soon, he rose to become one of television’s most popular conservative opinion makers, exercising enormous influence over American culture and politics. Then it all blew up in his face, he lost his TV show for being a creep, and he was forced to become friends with Dennis Miller. This week, Evil Men examines the pissed off life of Bill O’Reilly. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> discuss the Pope, the Beatles, Kim and Kanye and MORE!</p>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>In 1811, two brutal attacks in London’s east end shocked the city and resulted in seven mangled bodies. The man arrested for the killings was one John Williams, a sailor with a reputation as a hothead. This week, Evil Men travels back to London&#8217;s sinister, foggy, vice-ridden docklands to gossip about the Ratcliff Highway murders and ask: did they get the right guy? Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: in the intro, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chis</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> discuss burlesque dancing, red hair and the value of DNA tests.</p>

<item>
<title>E18: Lavrentiy Beria</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=160</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e18-lavrentiy-beria</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 21 Oct 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/160/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/47071690/download.mp3" length="62955943" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Most people have never heard of Lavrentiy Beria, yet he was responsible for some of the grimmest crimes of the Stalin era. And he did it all while looking like Phil Collins.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Most people have never heard of Lavrentiy Beria, yet he was responsible for some of the grimmest crimes of the Stalin era. As the head of the Soviet secret police, Beria sent millions of innocent people to gulag labor camps, had suspected enemies executed, and oversaw one of World War II’s worst massacres. He was also a prolific sex criminal. And, as if all this wasn’t enough, he looked like Phil Collins. This week on Evil Men, we totally roast Lavrentiy Beria. Enjoy?</p>
<p>PLUS: <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chis</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> discuss their experiences taking acting classes, the history of the blues and MORE!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes and SPECIAL MATERIAL.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<itunes:summary>Most people have never heard of Lavrentiy Beria, yet he was responsible for some of the grimmest crimes of the Stalin era. And he did it all while looking like Phil Collins.

<title>E17: Freddy Krueger</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=156</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e17-freddy-krueger</link>

<description>Happy Halloween season! This week, Chris, Michael and James meet a very disgusting and depraved maniac who has murdered countless teens in their sleep. His name? Freddy Krueger. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Happy Halloween season! This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> meet a very disgusting and depraved maniac who has murdered countless teens in their sleep. His name? Freddy Krueger. Enjoy!</p>
<p>Special thanks to Aaron Read for being Fred. Follow Aaron on <a href="https://twitter.com/freddykuerig">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/clear.dog.food/">Instagram</a>!</p>

<title>E16: Martin Shkreli</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=148</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e16-martin-shkreli</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Wed, 06 Oct 2021 23:52:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/148/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/46859272/download.mp3" length="65078179" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Martin Shkreli became infamous as the smug “pharma bro” who raised the price of HIV drug Daraprim from $13.50 to $750.00 per tablet. But is he evil? Or is he the inevitable outcome of America’s poorly regulated pharmaceutical industry? Get ready to laugh!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Martin Shkreli became infamous as the smug “pharma bro” who raised the price of HIV drug Daraprim from $13.50 to $750.00 per tablet. But is he evil? Or is he the inevitable outcome of America’s poorly regulated pharmaceutical industry? And what about that $2 million Wu-Tang Clan album he bought? Or the Bloomberg journalist who fell in love with him? This week, Evil Men takes a nice, juicy look at currently incarcerated cartoon villain Martin Shkreli. Enjoy!</p>
<p>PLUS: <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a> talks about getting retweeted by Flea, <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> reflects on “white boy summer” and <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> goes to a baseball game.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes and SPECIAL  MATERIAL.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<title>E14: Peter Stumpp the Werewolf of Bedburg</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=126</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e14-peter-stumpp-the-werewolf-of-bedburg</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 23 Sep 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/126/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/46644815/download.mp3" length="66992356" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>In the late 16th century, a peculiar German farmer named Peter Stumpp was accused of being a werewolf after someone—or something—started slaughtering cattle, women and children. But was he a creature from hell... or simply a victim of superstition?
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>In the late 16<sup>th</sup> century, someone—or <em>something</em>—started killing and dismembering cattle in the town of Bedburg, Germany. Before long, the creature turned its wrath on Bedburg’s women and children. The man accused of these heinous crimes was a local farmer named Peter Stumpp, who the townsfolk believed to be a werewolf. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> explore the eerie, macabre case of Peter Stumpp.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes.</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>

<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<title>E13: Chevy Chase</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=117</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e13-chevy-chase</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 16 Sep 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/117/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/46541622/download.mp3" length="64890957" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Chevy Chase was Saturday Night Live’s first breakout star, dominated the box office in the 1980s, and brought joy to millions. But he was also a rude dude who clashed with almost everyone he ever worked with and generally treated people like bugs. 
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>He was Saturday Night Live’s first breakout star, dominated the box office in the 1980s, and brought joy to millions. But he was also a rude dude who clashed with almost everyone he ever worked with and generally treated people like worthless bugs. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> have a civilized conversation about legendary comedian and actor Chevy Chase.</p>
<p>Plus: Chris tells a wild story about leaving a party because of tummy trouble. Enjoy!</p>

This guy had more than a few screws loose!</p>

<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 02 Sep 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/106/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/46336734/download.mp3" length="59023787" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>He sleeps in the ocean. He has a face full of tentacles. He even dated his own damn SISTER. Hold on to your sanity, because this week Chris, James and Michael are looking at the life and times of famous 1920s scifi sea creature Cthulhu.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>He sleeps in the ocean. He has a face full of tentacles. He even dated his own damn sister. Hold on to your sanity, because this week <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> are looking at the life and times of famous 1920s scifi sea creature Cthulhu. What the heck was H.P. Lovecraft thinking? PLUS: the fellas discuss the finer points of crooning. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for EXCLUSIVE bonus episodes, including guest Q&amp;As and EVIL ZEN.</p>

<title>E10: The Unabomber with Sarah Hagi</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=105</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e10-the-unabomber-with-sarah-hagi</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 26 Aug 2021 11:04:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/105/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/46248318/download.mp3" length="66534513" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week, writer Sarah Hagi joins Chris, James and Michael to examine the incredibly stupid life of The Unabomber. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Ted Kaczynski could have done great things. He was the son of a Chicago sausage maker, he played trombone, and he was super good at math. But at some point he lost his way, became radicalized, and started mailing bombs all over the darn place. This week, writer <a href="https://twitter.com/KindaHagi">Sarah Hagi</a> joins <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> to examine the incredibly stupid life of The Unabomber. Enjoy!</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes, including SPECIAL EXCLUSIVE MATERIAL.</p>
<p>Follow <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Evil Men on Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>

<description>This week, Chris, James and Michael take a serious look at legendary comedian, golfer and sex enthusiast Bob Hope. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Some consider Bob Hope to be the godfather of modern comedy. But he was also a golfing fanatic, a warmonger and an INCREDIBLY horny man who lived for 100 years. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> take a serious look at legendary comedian Bob Hope. Enjoy!</p>

<description>This week, Chris, James and Michael take a grim trip back to 16th century Russia to learn about one of history’s greatest maniacs: Ivan the Terrible. The guy LOVED torture and murder!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> take a grim trip back to 16<sup>th</sup> century Russia to learn about one of history’s greatest maniacs: Ivan the Terrible. Sit back and relax as they chart Ivan’s amazing transformation from miserable child to bereaved father/husband to sadistic psycho. The guy <em>loved </em>torture and murder. Enjoy!</p>

Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>He was a charismatic ex-carny with a shady history and a bizarre accent. He also happened to manage one of the 20<sup>th</sup> century’s biggest superstars. This week, the Evil Men crew (<a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a>) looks at the strange and sinister life and times of Elvis Presley’s manager, Colonel Tom Parker. We learn about Vic’s humble beginnings in Latveria, his deep-seated mommy issues, why he’d make a bad boyfriend and MORE. Enjoy!</p>

<item>
<title>E3: Caligula</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=38</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e3-caligula</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Thu, 08 Jul 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/38/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/45598443/download.mp3" length="48102461" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>This week, Chris, James and Michael take a look at Roman Emperor Caligula’s twisted/perverted life and violent death. Enjoy!
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Roman emperor Caligula was the original Super Freak—a depraved weirdo who got his kicks through torture, murder and being a huge pervert. He was also the world’s worst wedding guest. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> take a look at Caligula’s twisted life and violent death. Enjoy!</p>

<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Gargamel. To humans, he’s just a silly wizard dressed in rags. But to the Smurfs, he represents an existential threat. This week, <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael</a> delve deep into Gargamel’s story to try to understand why he wants to murder the Smurfs, why he can’t find Smurf Village and whether the artist who created him was a hatemonger.</p>

<item>
<title>E1: Jeffrey Dahmer</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=21</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/e1-jeffrey-dahmer</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Wed, 30 Jun 2021 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/21/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/45471150/download.mp3" length="43608588" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>For the inaugural episode, the guys explore one of the most notorious evil men in history: Jeffrey Dahmer. 
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Welcome to EVIL MEN, the exciting new podcast hosted by comedians <a href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</a>. Each episode, they select an evil man, bad person, or fictional character and discuss what made them so damn evil—all while joking their heads off and not being too serious.</p>
<p>For the inaugural episode, the guys explore one of the most notorious evil men in history: Jeffrey Dahmer. They dig into Jeff’s life as a serial killer, plus they explore his little known ties to the worlds of practical jokes, tennis and the chocolate industry.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.patreon.com/evilmen">Support Evil Men on Patreon</a> for exclusive monthly bonus episodes!</p>
<p>Follow Evil Men on <a href="https://twitter.com/EvilMenPod">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.instagram.com/evilmenpod/">Instagram</a>. And rate and review us wherever possible!</p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>

<item>
<title>Introducing the Evil Men Podcast</title>
<guid isPermaLink="false">https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/?post_type=podcasts&#038;p=7</guid>
<link>https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/episode/introducing-the-evil-men-podcast</link>
<author>info@thesonarnetwork.com(The Sonar Network)</author>
<pubDate>Sat, 05 Jun 2021 14:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
<enclosure url="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/mediafile/7/https://pdcn.co/e/api.spreaker.com/v2/episodes/45165164/download.mp3" length="896137" type="audio/mpeg" />
<description>Evil Men is a podcast hosted by three comedians- Chris Locke, James Hartnett, and Michael Balazo.  Each episode, they select a single evil man, bad person, or fictional character and discuss what made them so damn evil - all while joking their heads off.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</description>
<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400">Evil Men is a podcast hosted by three comedians &#8211; Chris Locke, James Hartnett, and Michael Balazo.  Each episode, they select a single evil man, bad person, or fictional character and discuss what made them so damn evil &#8211; all while joking their heads off.  You’ll hear some super interesting nuggets of information about dubious historical or cultural figures, provided by three guys who don’t actually know what the hell they’re talking about.</span></p>
<p><a href="https://thesonarnetwork.com/">Brought to you By: The Sonar Network</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_JAMES_13382-11.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/jameshartnett">James Hartnett</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/summer-camp-blade-1.png" href="https://twitter.com/mbalazo">Michael Balazo</podcast:person>
<podcast:person role="Host" group="Cast" img="https://thesonarnetwork.com/evil-men/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WEB-REZ_SONAR_CHRIS-L_13483-13.jpg" href="https://twitter.com/chrislockeworld">Chris Locke</podcast:person>

<itunes:author>info@thesonarnetwork.com</itunes:author>
<itunes:episodeType>episode</itunes:episodeType>
<itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit>
<itunes:duration>0</itunes:duration>
<itunes:summary>Evil Men is a podcast hosted by three comedians- Chris Locke, James Hartnett, and Michael Balazo.  Each episode, they select a single evil man, bad person, or fictional character and discuss what made them so damn evil - all while joking their heads off.
Brought to you By: The Sonar Network https://thesonarnetwork.com/</itunes:summary>
